role.descr: break point /* related to prepositional phrase such as "at", "prior to" */

example.text: It is observed that the frameshift SOX9 truncates the six activation domains, while all counter-sense mutations reported to date are in the high-mobility group DNA binding domain (HMG).
Merchshift SOX9, as shown by our data, has shown to truncate six activation domains, while all the absent mutations reported so far are in the high mobility group DNA binding domain (HMG).
Practically all A0 mutations (TSC1) may have dramatically truncated the protein.

Previous studies using the Encephalomyocarditis Virus Type TSC1 and the Mengo virus, and variants of these viruses, which are likely to be genetic engineering to replace or truncate protein product produced conflicting data on the role of the poly(C) sector in the virulence of these viruses.
